Method.name: %OnClose
fatalError
Method.Implementation:
Write !,$$$T("SAX Fatal Error (a document could not be loaded): "),fatalerror,!
Do ##class(ErrorLog).AddError(..SourceFile, "SAX fatal", fatalerror)

Method.name: error
Method.Implementation:
Write !,$$$T("SAX Error (a document could not be loaded): "),error,!
Do ##class(ErrorLog).AddError(..SourceFile, $$$T("SAX error"), error)

Method.name: GetElementType
Method.Description: converts an element name into a "category" type
Method.Implementation:
Quit:(localname = "") ""
Set test = "," _ localname _ "," Quit:(..MetaElements [ test) "meta" Quit:(..ContainerElements [ test) "container" Quit:(..BlockElements [ test) "block" Quit ""

Method.name: GetTag
Method.Description: Returns a formatted start tag for the given element and attr values

Method.name: GetAttrPairs
Method.Description: Returns a formatted string of the attribute values
Method.Implementation:
Set result = "" For i = 1:5:$LL(attrs) { Set:(result '= "") result = result _ " " Set name = $LG(attrs, i+1) Set value = $ZCONVERT($LG(attrs, i+4), "O", "HTML") Set result = result _ name _ "=""" _ value _ """" }
Quit result

Method.name: Assert
Method.Description: Test if condition is true, else write an error
Method.Implementation: If ('cond) { Set lin = 0 Set pos = 0 Do ..LocatePosition(.lin, .pos) Set assertion = $$$T("----- Assertion Check: ") _ msg _ $$$T(" at line ") _ lin _ $$$T(" offset ") _ pos Write assertion ,! Quit 0 } Quit 1

Method.name: Trace
Method.Description: Test if condition is true, else write an error
Method.Implementation: Quit:($ZBOOLEAN(+(..TraceValue), +(flag), 1)) 1 Quit 0

Method.name: IsKnown
Method.Description: Test if condition is true, else write an error
Method.Implementation: Set SearchString = "," _ name _ "," Quit:(..KnownTags [ SearchString) 1 Quit 0

Method.name: UnpackAttrs
Method.Description: Converts list of attrs into an array keyed by attr name

Method.name: ValidateID
Method.Description: Make sure the ID value is appropriate for the file
Method.Implementation:
; empty id values are ok Quit:(IDchars = "") 1
; SET checks always succeed Quit:($ZCONVERT($EXTRACT(Filename, 1, 3), "U") = "SET") 1
; check for match up through first "." or "_" Set prefix = $PIECE($PIECE(Filename, ".", 1), "_", 1) Set len = $LENGTH(prefix) Quit ($EXTRACT(IDchars, 1, len) = prefix)

Method.name: CheckEntity
Method.Description: Check for proper usage of this entity
Method.Implementation:
Set NE = $$$T("Numeric entity") Set DE = $$$T("Deprecated entity")
; check for numeric entities Do ..Assert(($EXTRACT(entityname, 1, 1) '= "#"), (NE _ " - " _ entityname))
; check for deprecated entities Do ..Assert((..DeprecatedEntities '[ ("," _ entityname _ ",")), (DE _ " - " _ entityname))
Quit

Method.name: CheckCharsLen
Method.Implementation: Set boundary = 28000 Set newlength = $LENGTH(..CurrText) + $LENGTH(newchars) Do ..Assert((newlength <= boundary), ($$$T("Aggregate text length may cause translation error: ") _ newlength _ " > " _boundary)) Quit
